channel.title: Need a host and a coder! HOST MUST BE PORTFORWARDED :P
channel.description: I need a host thats portforwarded, that can code well, im a newbie coder, and I'm running on a 317 delta source w/ client. :D Skype - lol.i.jerk Msn - themetal@live.com Or just leave a comment! :) Thanks.

item.title: Need a host and a coder! HOST MUST BE PORTFORWARDED :P
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

[quote=“nsfpure, post:2, topic:405958”]1. Against the rules.
2. Learn to code if you’re a “newbie”
3. Why can’t you do this all yourself[/quote]

Everyone starts somewhere :P. Anywho, no-one is probably replying because this is the wrong section bro ;). Try posting in the Development Team section, so you can get coders | hoster , ect.

Read full topic
